title: Breaking Through the Uncanny Valley
excerpt: In 1970 robotics professor Masahiro Mori observed, "Bbukimi no tani gensh≈ç," which was later translated into "uncanny valley". This refers to an observed phenomenon (first in robots, but also applies to digital recreations) that the more human-like the robot the greater the emotional affinity of people.
